name: Plunder Blunder
description:
HTML  VERSION MAY HAVE PERFORMANCE ISSUES!

(and may be a little bit buggy, i got it working last second)

Plunder Blunder is a fast paced shoot em up made in 48 hours total for the Miz Jam!

Run around grabbing powerups, health, and 7 different weapons while defending off hordes of monsters! The game lasts until round 10, at which point you can leave or continue playing endless bonus rounds. Don't be afraid to post high scores!

Note: You might have to retry a few times! Don't be discouraged! Make sure to use your dash and jump abilities, and the fire in the environment to your advantage! If you're having trouble, try staying near the dock. You can smash the graves at the start for some extra help!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift - Dash

Space - Jump

Click - Shoot/Reload

R - Reload

Tab - Toggle Stats

M - Toggle Music

F1 - Toggle Performance
